articles.title: Analysts: Stadium site sale part of financial boon for Red Rock – The Nevada Independent - The Nevada Independent
articles.description: Red Rock Resorts hasn't given the sale price for the 49 acres that is being acquired by the Oakland A's for a new Las Vegas home.
articles.content:
While the Oakland As make plans for a $1.5 billion baseball stadium, Red Rock Resorts is counting its money.
